channel.title: Did I lose the game when I could have won?
channel.description:
Okay, so I was drunk and had one HH left. However, I debbed the reaper (player 10) instead of HHing him. If I'd HH'ed him and he'd still used Empowered Reap, would I have lived?
https://imgur.com/a/CfBmKqm

item.title: Did I lose the game when I could have won?
item.dc:creator: methomps
item.description:
Yep, learned that lesson the hard way in a game where unseen was wiped out and evil king made a deal with reaper to protect him until the end. If you deb the reaper once, you gotta HH after that because the empower is coming.

Read full topic
item.source: Did I lose the game when I could have won?

item.title: Did I lose the game when I could have won?
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Yes, he would’ve been occupied and not targeted you.

Deb kills you in that case because it forces him to target you and Empower breaks through death immune to reap you.

Read full topic
item.source: Did I lose the game when I could have won?

item.title: Did I lose the game when I could have won?
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
HH occupies but bypasses occupy immunity. So yes you would have lived.

Read full topic
item.source: Did I lose the game when I could have won?

item.title: Did I lose the game when I could have won?
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Yes, using HH would’ve saved you.

Read full topic
item.source: Did I lose the game when I could have won?
